name: iTech Hide Add Cart If Already Purchased
author: iTech Theme

sections.description:
This plugin will hide add to cart button for logged in user who already purchased the product.

N.B: If you want more options in this plugin, please contact with us

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

We recommend your host supports:

  • PHP version 7.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater
  • WP Memory limit of 64 MB or greater (128 MB or higher is preferred)
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload hcap.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates
